organization.content:
Please identify the "Organization" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Results of a World Cup two-man bobsleigh event on Saturday :

Let's think step by step.

| Organization |
| --- |
| World Cup |
| International Bobsleigh & Skeleton Federation (IBSF) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Organization" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Organization |
| --- |
| International Bobsleigh & Skeleton Federation (IBSF) |

The entity "World Cup" does not clearly refer to an organization, as it can also refer to a sporting event or a tournament. Therefore, the only valid organization in the given paragraph is the "International Bobsleigh & Skeleton Federation (IBSF)".
